ygData.messageBody:
Nuada Armat'gh wrote:

> I was lokking at the spell lists and saw that the mage epic, is a lvl 46
> spell yet we continue to get get our normal pets up to lvl 60. i was
> told that the epic pet is the "hardest" pet in the game, yet how is that
> when surly a lvl 60 pet would be better? does the epic pet get better
> stats, new abilties etc as the mage levels up or is it already better
> than the pets we get after lvl 46?


have a look at
http://matt.waggoner.com/orbofmastery.html
for some stats about the pet and the orb (and the walkthrough)

to quote this site (close to "- QUEST RUNDOWN -"):
According to Chris Babb, the epic pet always hits for max 67, is always
level 49, has a DD attack for 160 damage and a 6 second stun, has 2500hp
and a 50 point damage shield. If anyone else can confirm these numbers,
that would be great.

besides, for the epic walthrough i prefer
http://www.magecompendium.com/Quests/Orb_of_Mastery.htm

one hint for young mages, if you really want to go for the epic: start
as soon as possible to gather the information needed. some parts can
be obtained very early (like 25 to 30 for the focus items) and it is
quite a waste of time, to go to those places 20 levels later to camp
green stuff. but to actually do this quest, most will be over 55 until
they finished it ... if they finish it at all.

for me it is five items to go:
- Torch of Elements, Neh'Ashirr, City of Mist
- Blazing Wand, Undertow, Kedge Keep
- Staff of Elemental Mastery: Earth, Magi P'tasa, Hate
- Staff of Elemental Mastery: Water, Phinigel Autropos, Kedge Keep
- Crown of Elemental Mastery, ?random drop?, Air

with the "crown" the only dropable item, but i can't afford 30k to 60k
to buy one. CoM and Kedge sound possible with a small group, but what
i read about the drop rate makes me sick. hate ... well, it is hate.

i have been on air up to spiroc isle. it will be very interesting if i
ever get to the 8th (or 7th, depends on how you count) isle. but there
are other things to do first.


- bilt


Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 53 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr
